resources.string: The game consists of a board, which you can press each of the boxes in blue avoiding finding a mine, in addition, you can get a number to continue advancing…
If 1, it means that on either side there may be a mine, keep that in mind!
If 2, it means that on either side there can be only two mines.
Finally, the 3 means that there are only three mines on either side. The trick is to correctly count the possible mines that there may be, taking into account the other numbers
You win if you open all boxes without finding any mine.
